flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: We built this to compliment young 9 year old Thomas's Wizard costume this Halloween. Due to other work I had going on, we got a VERY late start putting this together, completing the majority of the work in the 4 days before Halloween, and as such there are many things that should definitely be done differently... I'll do my best to mention those issues as we come to them. The majority of the work involves carving the wooden dragon head and squeezing in the electronics.
